Description: ## Folder structure directories for ICM components - all paths relative to main /Gxxx/ directory
Working folder for Hydro model
Working folder for Geomorphology model
Working folder for Vegetation model
Working folder for Barrier Island model
Working folder for Habitat Suitability Indices
Working folder for Fish Biomass model
## Path to compiled executables used by ICM
Path to ICM-Hydro executable (relative to /Gxxx/hydro/ path)
Path to ICM-BIDEM executable (relative to each /Gxxx/bidem/REGION/ path)
Path to ICM-Morph executable (relative to /Gxxx/ path)
## Filenames for various ICM components
Input Configuration Filename for Vegetation model
Input Configuration Filename for Geomorphology model
Input Configuration Filename for Hydrology model
Filename for hydrology compartments file Hydrology model
Filename for hydraulic link file for Hydrology model
Filename for MHW file prepared by Hydrology model for use in Barrier Island Model
Filenaming convention tag to use for existing condition files
Filenaming convention tag to use for FWOA initial condition files
Shallow subsidence column to use for current scenario (1=25th; 2=50th; 3=75th percentiles)
## Filenames for Veg model input
Vegetation model input file: Standard deviation in summer water level
Vegetation model input file: Mean annual salinity
Vegetation model input file: Mean summer water depth
Vegetation model input file: Mean summer salinity
Vegetation model input file: Mean summer water temperature
Vegetation model input file: Tree establishment condition flag
Vegetation model input file: Barrier Island height above mean water level
Vegetation model input file: Land-water file (percent land)
Vegetation model input file: Land-water file (percent water)
Vegetation model input file: Acute salinity stress file
## Simulation Settings
Start year of full simulation (e.g. year 0 of spin-up)
Final year of full simulation (equals start year for a 1 year run)
Current cycle (full model run can be split into cycles for HPC batch runs)
First year of current cycle (e.g. hotstart year) (set to Start Year if only one cycle)
Last year of current cycle (set to Final Year if only one cycle
First year of data in Hydro input files
Vegetation types modeled
Update elevation attributes of hydro links and compartments (1 if yes - 0 if no)
## 500m grid structure
Number of 500 m grid cells with data
Number of rows in Vegetation input ASCII file
Number of columns in Vegetation input ASCII file
X coordinate(UTM meters) of lower left corner of Vegetation input ASCII file
Y coordinate(UTM meters) of lower left corner of Vegetation input ASCII file
## EwE 1000m grid structure
Number of 1000 m grid cells
Number of rows in Fisheries input ASCII file
Number of columns in Fisheries input ASCII file
X coordinate(UTM meters) of lower left corner of Fisheries input ASCII file
Y coordinate(UTM meters) of lower left corner of Fisheries input ASCII file
## Filenaming settings
Filename prefix to use for all files
Scenario term for filename(S22)
Group term for filename (G333)
CLARA term for filename(C22)
Uncertainty term for filename(U22)
Variance term for filename(V22)
Region term for filename(3 letters)
## 1D River Model
Number of 1D River Domain
1D River Model main setup file
## Barrier Island Model settings
Input Configuration Filename for Tidal Inlet model
Number of BIMODE directories
Subfolder in BIDEM directory 1
Subfolder in BIDEM directory 2
Subfolder in BIDEM directory 3
Subfolder in BIDEM directory 4
Subfolder in BIDEM directory 5
Subfolder in BIDEM directory 6
Fixed BIDEM xyz grid for BIDEM directory 1
Fixed BIDEM xyz grid for BIDEM directory 2
Fixed BIDEM xyz grid for BIDEM directory 3
Fixed BIDEM xyz grid for BIDEM directory 4
Fixed BIDEM xyz grid for BIDEM directory 5
Fixed BIDEM xyz grid for BIDEM directory 6
